title.rendered: The Best Online Slot Betting Sites in 2021

content.rendered:
Stuck in that sinking sand of deciding which is the best slots sites to bet on? At the end of this article, you’ll have enough information to make an informed decision. All you need to know – the juiciest of deals, bonus codes, and lots of other features that will guide you – we provide to you on a platter of gold.

With thousands of assorted games hitting platforms this February alone, you surely have been wondering what the best choice is for you, but that is no longer a problem.

Let’s get started.

Online Slots-What You Should Know

Online slots are quickly becoming a favorite in the industry. Slot machine games translate really well online, compared to other casino and bingo games. This is why they’ve risen in popularity over the last couple of years. The same software that are used in slot machines on casino floors are also the ones used in online slot games.

Why it’s Important that You Know the Best Slot Sites To Bet On

1. The best sites pack a lot of buzzes. The excitement they create knows no bounds.

2. There’ll be a lot of online reviews by dedicated players and gurus of the industry available to help you choose the best game titles.

3. Free games when you don’t want to stake money. You get to stake your money only when you want.

4. The platforms are available to you 24/7. You can browse through the latest online slots at any time.

5. Ability to sign up on the different slot sites and online casinos. You can also pick your choice from the array of titles and catalogs on offer.

Here are some of the criteria with which we selected our favorite slots sites for the year:

RTP for Slots

RTP simply means Return To Player ratio. The best online slot sites provide high RTPs, which means they pay players well! With RTP values, you can know how frequently (or how much and how well) a game pays out over a lifetime. 

  • Their bonus programs should offer you a lot of money to spread across different games and should not be restricted to a select few. We took a careful look at wagering requirements. You shouldn’t have to spend more money than is necessary for the long run.
  • The site should be compatible with your smartphone or tablet. You should be able to download free apps and programs on it.
  • We took a careful look at the software developers they have and the technology available. We checked whether or not LIVE PLAY was available. Lastly, we took a look at the available games on each platform and matched them against other catalogs.
  • We verified whether or not customers can cash out in the same way that you pay in. Are e-wallets accepted, or is payment restricted to just cards and bank transfers? The best slots sites (listed below) provide you with a wide array of payment options.
  • Payment protection is paramount. We looked out for their updated security certificates. This told us whether or not payments are truly secure on the platform.
  • We checked if members could win progressive jackpots if there are regular promotions on the site, and we took a look at the website’s licensing. The best sites are fully licensed and regulated.

Applying all the above criteria thoroughly, these are the online slots sites that came out on top on our list.

The 12 Best Slot Sites To Bet On and Their Amazing Promotional Offers

1. Bgo Slots

You stand a chance of winning up to 500 free spins.

2. 32 Red Slots

A shopping 150% bonus of up to £150 up for grabs.

3. Wizard Slots

Snatch up to 500 free spins.

4. Ladbrokes Slots

An offer of £50 welcome bonus.

5. Coral Slots

£50 welcome bonus available

6. Gala Spins

£20 bonus on offer.

7. Slots Racer

Get a 500 free spins bonus

8. Unibet Slots

Make a deposit of £100, play with £300.

9. Amazon Slots

500 free spins for you.

10. Paddy Power Games

An offer of 100 free spins.

11. Pirate Slots

Grab up to 500 free spins.

12. Rocket Slots

Up to 500 free spins to win.

So there you have it; the best online slots websites. Sign up on any one of them now and claim your offers!
